Header: 146 schools damaged by flooding and landslides
Content: The Education Ministry says that due to inclement weather conditions affecting the island about 146 schools in the Sabaragamuwa, South and the Western provinces have been damaged. The Ministry said that in the Sabaragamuwa province alone 65 schools have been damaged. 64 schools in the Western Province and 17 schools in the Southern Province have been damaged due to floods and land slides.
